buildCommand: jq 'del(.scripts.prepare)' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd apps/web && jq 'del(.scripts.prepare)' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && npm install && npm run build
installCommand: jq 'del(.scripts.prepare)' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd apps/web && jq 'del(.scripts.prepare)' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && npm install
